title: Tuuna MultiSystem AI
description: A comprehensive AI ecosystem featuring system automation, student management, and multi-model AI integration (Gemini, Groq, DeepSeek).

details.fullDescription: Tuuna is an advanced AI assistant capable of controlling system applications, managing student databases, and switching between multiple LLMs for optimal performance.

title: MediScope
description: AI-driven healthcare platform for disease prediction and medical resource management.

details.fullDescription: MediScope leverages machine learning algorithms to predict potential health issues based on patient data tailored for medical professionals.

title: GovSec AI
description: Security-focused AI solution designed for government applications, enhancing data protection and threat detection.

details.fullDescription: GovSec AI provides advanced threat detection and secure data processing capabilities tailored for sensitive government environments.

title: Legal Academia
description: Educational platform for law students and professionals, offering course management and legal resources.

details.fullDescription: A comprehensive Learning Management System (LMS) designed specifically for the legal field, facilitating online legal education.

title: MoneyViewer
description: Personal finance management tool for tracking expenses, income, and visualizing financial habits.

details.fullDescription: MoneyViewer helps users take control of their finances by providing intuitive dashboards to track spending and savings.

title: StudyBuddy
description: AI-powered study companion that helps students organize schedules and find resources.

details.fullDescription: StudyBuddy is an intelligent assistant for students, offering features like schedule planning, resource recommendations, and focus timers.

title: Product Gen AI
description: Generative AI tool for creating product descriptions, marketing copy, and visual assets.

details.fullDescription: Leverages large language models to automate the creation of marketing content and product listings for e-commerce.

title: Healthcare Recommendation System
description: Recommendation engine for suggesting healthcare providers and treatments based on patient needs.

details.fullDescription: A system designed to match patients with the most suitable healthcare providers and treatment plans using collaborative filtering.

title: Netflix Data Analysis
description: Comprehensive data analysis of Netflix content library, uncovering trends in genres, countries, and release years.

details.fullDescription: An exploratory data analysis (EDA) project that visualizes insights from the Netflix dataset to understand content strategies.

title: Antigravity For Linux
description: Linux-compatible version of the Antigravity automation tool, bringing system control to open-source OS environments.

details.fullDescription: Extends the capabilities of the Antigravity automation suite to Linux systems, allowing for shell command automation and package management.

title: Online Music Player
description: Web-based music streaming application with playlist management and audio visualization.

details.fullDescription: A responsive web application for streaming music, creating playlists, and enjoying visualized audio experiences.
